TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WritingProgressChangedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs

MemberSignature.Value: public WritingProgressChangedEventArgs (System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel writingLevel, int number, int progressPercentage, object state);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel writingLevel, int32 number, int32 progressPercentage, object state) cil managed
Public Sub New (writingLevel As WritingProgressChangeLevel, number As Integer, progressPercentage As Integer, state As Object)
public: WritingProgressChangedEventArgs(System::Windows::Documents::Serialization::WritingProgressChangeLevel writingLevel, int number, int progressPercentage, System::Object ^ state);

Docs.param: 指定更改事件（例如，针对整个多文档序列、单个文档或单页的事件）的进度范围的枚举值。
已写入的文档数或页数，取决于 writingLevel 定义的范围。
已写入的数据的百分比。
标识写操作的用户提供的对象。
Docs.summary: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户提供`state`参数是将对象传递给<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WriteAsync%2A>标识异步写入操作的方法。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Number As Integer
public: property int Number { int get(); };

Docs.summary: 获取已写入的文档数或页数。
Docs.value: 在事件发生时已写入的文档数或页数。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>属性是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel.FixedDocumentSequenceWritingProgress>，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>指定都已写入的文档数。 对于所有其他<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>是都已写入的页面数。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WritingLevel As WritingProgressChangeLevel

Docs.summary: 获取一个值，该值指示写入进度的范围。
Docs.value: 指定写入多文档序列、单个文档或单页的范围的枚举。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>属性是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangeLevel.FixedDocumentSequenceWritingProgress>、<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>属性指定的已写入的文档数。 对于所有其他<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.WritingLevel%2A>情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingProgressChangedEventArgs.Number%2A>属性是都已写入的页面数。
